parameters.url: =https://qan8n.shakedeal.com/webhook/get-url

nodes.name: Function to get the splitted grn

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipment_items?filter={"_and": [{"sdm_shipments_id":{"invoice_number":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["vendor_invoice"]}}"}}},{"sdm_po_items_id":{"product":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["product"]}}"}}},{"sdm_shipments_id":{"vendor_po_num":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["vendor_po"]}}"}}},{"sdm_po_items_id":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["po_item_id"]}}"}}]}

={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipment_items/{{$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["id"]}}?fields= *,sdm_shipments_id.*,sdm_shipments_id.shipment_items.*

parameter.name: received_qty
parameter.value: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["received_qty"] != 0 && $node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["file_name"] != $node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["file_name"]? $node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["received_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["received_qty"]):$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["received_qty"]}}

parameter.name: accepted_qty
parameter.value: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["accepted_qty"] != 0 && $node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["file_name"] != $node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["file_name"]?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["accepted_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["accepted_qty"]):$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["accepted_qty"]}}

parameter.name: rejected_qty
parameter.value: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["rejected_qty"] != 0 && $node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["file_name"] != $node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["file_name"] ?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["rejected_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["rejected_qty"]):$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["rejected_qty"]}}

parameter.name: remaining_qty
parameter.value: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["accepted_qty"] != 0 && $node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["file_name"] != $node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["file_name"] ?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["remaining_qty"]+parseFloat($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["accepted_qty"]):$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["remaining_qty"]}}

parameter.name: grn_number
parameter.value: ={{$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["grn_number"]?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["grn_number"].includes($node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["grn_number"])?$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["grn_number"]:$node["Get Shipment Items"].json["data"][0]["grn_number"]+","+$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["grn_number"]:$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["grn_number"]}}

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_inventory?filter={"product":{"_in":"{{$node["Function to get product ids"].json["productIds"]}}"}}

nodes.name: Function to return updated inventory stock

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to return updated inventory stock"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_inventory/{{$node["Function to return updated inventory stock"].json["id"]}}
={{$node["Function to update grn in mozart"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipments/{{$node["Function to update grn in mozart"].json["id"]}}

nodes.name: Function to update grn in vpanel

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to update grn in vpanel"].json["vendor_url"]}}/items/sdv_shipment_items?filter={"_and": [{"sdv_shipments_id":{"invoice_number":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to update grn in vpanel"].json["invoice_number"]}}"}}},{"sdv_vendor_pos_sdv_products_id":{"po_items_id":{"_eq":"{{$node["Function to update grn in vpanel"].json["sdm_po_items_id"]}}"}}}]}
={{$node["Function to update grn in vpanel"].json["vendor_url"]}}/items/sdv_shipment_items/{{$node["Get the shipmentItem from vpanel"].json["data"][0]["id"]}}

parameters.functionCode:
let returnItems = $node["Function to get vendor invoices"].json["returnItems"];

return returnItems

nodes.name: Function to update grn in mozart

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipment_items/{{$node["Update shipment Items"].json["data"]["id"]}}?fields= *,sdm_shipments_id.*,sdm_shipments_id.shipment_items.*

parameter.name: grn_status
parameter.value: ={{$node["Update shipment Items"].json["data"]["accepted_qty"] >= $node["Update shipment Items"].json["data"]["shipment_qty"]?"grn_accepted":$node["Update shipment Items"].json["data"]["rejected_qty"] >= $node["Update shipment Items"].json["data"]["shipment_qty"]?"grn_rejected":$node["Update shipment Items"].json["data"]["accepted_qty"]>0 && $node["Update shipment Items"].json["data"]["accepted_qty"]<$node["Update shipment Items"].json["data"]["shipment_qty"]?"grn_partially_accepted":$node["Update shipment Items"].json["data"]["grn_status"]}}

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to get non-consignment items"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_order_invoices?filter={"id":{"_in":"{{$node["Function to get non-consignment items"].json["orderInvoices"]}}"}}&fields=*,order.*,order.shipments.sdm_shipments_id.*

={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipment_items/{{$node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["id"]}}?fields= *,sdm_shipments_id.*,sdm_shipments_id.shipment_items.*

parameter.name: resolution
parameter.value: ={{$node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["grn_status"] == "grn_pending" && $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["received_qty"] <  $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["shipment_qty"]?"resolution_pending":$node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["grn_status"] == "grn_partially_accepted" && $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["accepted_qty"] < $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["received_qty"]?"resolution_pending": $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["grn_status"] == "grn_rejected" ? "resolution_pending":$node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["grn_status"] == "grn_partially_accepted" && $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["accepted_qty"] == $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["received_qty"]?null:$node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["grn_status"] == "grn_pending" && $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["resolution"] == "resolution_pending"  && $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["received_qty"] == $node["Update Shipment item grn status"].json["data"]["shipment_qty"]?null:null}}

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to update grn in mozart"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipment_items/{{$node["Update shipment status"].json["data"]["shipment_items"][0]}}
={{$node["Function to get the splitted grn"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_grn_history
={{$node["Function to get non-consignment items"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_shipments?filter={"dc_number":{"_in":"{{$node["Function to get non-consignment items"].json["dcInvoices"]}}"}}
=https://sdqa.mozart.shakedeal.com/items/sdm_shipments?filter={"invoice_number":{"_in":"{{$node["Function to get grn data"].json["consignmentVendorInvoiceArr"]}}"}

=https://sdqa.mozart.shakedeal.com/items/sdm_order_invoices?filter={"id":{"_in":"{{$node["Function to get grn data"].json["nonConsignmentInvoiceArr"]}}"}&fields=*,order.*,order.shipments.sdm_shipments_id.*
=https://sdqa.mozart.shakedeal.com/items/sdm_shipments?filter={"dc_number":{"_in":"{{$node["Function to get grn data"].json["dcInvoicesArr"]}}"}
=https://sdqa.mozart.shakedeal.com/items/sdm_shipments

nodes.name: Function to get sd order invoice from grn history

parameters.url: ={{$node["Function to get sd order invoice from grn history"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_grn_history?filter={"_and":[{"po_item_id":{"_in":"{{$node["Function to get sd order invoice from grn history"].json["po_item_ids"]}}"}},{"movement_type":{"_eq":"received"}}]}
={{$node["Function to get non-consignment items"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_grn_history
={{$node["Function to get non-consignment items"].json["dms_url"]}}/items/sdm_grn_history
